doc.title: Beans, Bullets, and Black Oil
doc.plot: Documentary short film depicting the U.S. Navy's Supply Corps (Service Group 3) in its efforts to keep the U.S. Seventh Fleet supplied with everything necessary to conduct the sea war in and around Vietnamese waters. Ship-to-ship, ship-to-shore, and helicopter-to-ship resupply missions are shown, along with archival footage of supply efforts in earlier times.
